actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of November 2, 1966, relating to the Ansley Wilcox House, Buffalo, New York, a national historic site.

summary.text: Designates the Ansley Wilcox House in Buffalo, New York, as the Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site to be administered by the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the National Park Service. Authorizes the Secretary to enter into cooperative agreements with the Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural Site Foundation or other qualified public or private entities for the operation, maintenance, management, development, and interpretation of such site.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of November 2, 1966, relating to the Ansley Wilcox House, Buffalo, New York, a national historic site.
